data.title: Melissa: Name Meaning, Origin, History, And Popularity
data.meta_description: Melissa is a feminine name rooted in ancient Greek mythology. Here's everything you need to know about the moniker.
data.text:
In This Article

Origin, Meaning, And History Of Melissa

Melissa is a classic, sweet-sounding name that originates from ancient Greek and means honeybee. Its derived from ‚Äòmeli,‚Äô which means honey. The name also refers to a herb from the mint family, lemon balm. Melissa is also believed to have Gaelic origins, deriving from Maoil√≠osa, which means ‚Äòservant of Christ.‚Äô

In ancient Greek mythology, Melissa was the child of a Cretan king, Melisseus. She was a nymph with supernatural powers. Legends say that Melissa found out about the usage of honey and taught it to the bees. It concludes the name‚Äôs meaning in its entirety.

Melissa is also a manifestation of the ancient Greek goddess Artemis, the moon goddess, who takes away or alleviates pain during childbirth. It is believed that Melissa may have been an old Goddess. The Greek philosopher Porphyry wrote that the priestesses called The Mellisae were initiates of Melissa as the chthonic goddess.

The name has variations in different cultures and languages. In the Geek, the name‚Äôs variants include Malisa, Malissa, Melessa, and Melisa. In French, it is M√©lisse, and in Spanish Melosa.

The name has made a mark in popular culture. Writers like Charles Dickens, Rudyard Kipling, and Lawrence Durrell named their charecters Melissa, contributing significantly to popularizing the name. The name also found a place in the lyrics of many hit songs in the 1990s. ‚ÄòMelissa‚Äô by the Allman Brothers Band, ‚ÄòMelissa‚Äô featuring Jackson Browne and Gregg Allman, and the recent ‚ÄòMelissa‚Äôs Song‚Äô by Duff Kelly, kept the name‚Äôs popularity intact.

Other occurrences of the name in popular culture include the American sitcom ‚ÄòMelissa & Joey,‚Äô and Melissa Egan from the movie ‚ÄòI Know What You Did Last Summer.‚Äô Melissa Hastings is another character from the hit series ‚ÄòPretty Little Liars.‚Äô Notably, May 27 is observed as National Melissa Day to observe all Melissas who graced the world for centuries.

Melissa On The Popularity Chart

Melissa‚Äôs popularity peaked in the 1980s. View this chart below to learn about the name‚Äôs growth over the years.

Popularity Over Time

Although Melissa remained popular in the past few centuries, the name is seeing a downward trend now. In 1985, over 20,0000 babies per million were named Melisssa, which dropped to about 1000 names in 2020.

Source:

Rank Over Time

The name was among the top five baby names in 1980. However, the name is ranked 360 in 2021.

Source:

Melissa Name‚Äôs Presence On Social Media

Before you finalize your baby‚Äôs name, you would want to assess if the name is rare or popular. Digital footprint of the name - it‚Äôs presence on the internet and social media platforms - can provide you with valuable insights on it‚Äôs popularity. A name‚Äôs online presence is an important metric for new parents to evaluate their options and make an informed choice. How many people are searching the name on Google, how many profiles are there on Facebook, does the name have a Wikipedia page? Such information surely tells you if the name is ubiquitous or unique. Melissa‚Äôs Zodiac Sign As Per Western Astrology

Western astrology includes the construction of a horoscope based on the person‚Äôs exact time of birth and location to understand the positions of the planet, stars, and zodiac signs at that time. However, in popular culture, it is often narrowed down to the sun sign, which depends on the person‚Äôs birth date.There are 12 zodiac signs, each having dominant traits, planetary rulers, elemental connection, and more.

Zodiac sign or Sun sign

The Earth‚Äôs orbit around the sun is divided into 12 zodiac signs covering 30-degree sectors. According to Western astrology, the zodiac or sun sign depends on the sun‚Äôs position in one of these sectors at the time of your birth. Starting from the sun‚Äôs position at the March equinox, the chart goes anti-clockwise from Aries, followed by Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, and Pisces. These signs are ruled by planetary bodies - Mars, Venus, Mercury, Moon, Sun, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune. Furthermore, they are categorized into triplicities or elemental signs - fire, water, air, and earth - that govern their characteristics. Each of these zodiac signs features certain personality traits that may determine how a person presents themselves.

Each zodiac sign in Western astrology is linked to a specific range of dates in the year. Unlike Vedic astrology, where names can sometimes be used to infer astrological details, Western astrology relies entirely on the birth date.

To know more about your baby‚Äôs zodiac sign, choose the period in which your baby‚Äôs date of birth falls, from the options given below. This will give you a glimpse into the world of astrology tailored for your baby.

Melissa‚Äôs Zodiac Sign And Birth Star As Per Vedic Astrology

Melissa Personality Traits As Per Numerology

The numerology belief system envisages a relationship between a name and numbers. The related numbers are believed to give insights into a person‚Äôs character. We have researched this area to connect the numerology-based characteristic traits to the letters of the English alphabet. And the results are fascinating.

Numerology followers believe that each letter signifies attributes that can influence a person‚Äôs attitude and approach. Among these placements, the most significant are the first letter (Cornerstone) and the last letter (Capstone) of a name. Cornerstone highlights your primary personality traits and explains how you face challenges and opportunities in life. Capstone can tell you about your approach to work and how you complete them. Often, a letter may be repeated twice or more in a name. This repetition signifies the intensification or amplification of the traits associated with the letter in an individual‚Äôs personality.

Read to know what characteristics the name Melissa is known for in numerology. Here we have avoided repetition of letters and added them just once for a better reading experience.

Infographic: Know The Name Melissa‚Äòs Personality As Per Numerology
